definitions.definition: A payment of time, effort or money to compensate for past transgression(s).
The act of renewing, restoring, etc., or the state of being renewed or repaired.

main_definition: ( usually in the plural ) A payment of time, effort or money to compensate for past transgression(s).
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) The act of renewing, restoring, etc., or the state of being renewed or repaired.
